Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I think it has positively impacted my learning as feedback is often only given after the assignment is completed. Getting feedback before submission from GenAI allows me to identify where I can improve.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from GenAI is very structured while feedback from teachers is more personal. More personal feedback can make me feel good when the overall feedback is positive. When negative feedback is received, then this can have a negative impact on me
